Tolerance, as defined by either of the following: a. A need for markedly increased amounts of the phency- clidine to achieve intoxication or desired effect. b. A markedly diminished effect with continued use of the same amount of the phencyclidine. Note: Withdrawal symptoms and signs are not established for phencyclidines, and so this criterion does not apply. (Withdrawal from phencyclidines has been reported in animals but not docu- mented in human users.)
